trait.name: Tunneler
entries: aurumvorax能以其一半的钻探速度钻过坚固的岩石和金属，并在其身后留下一条直径5英尺的隧道。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥鲁姆沃拉克斯进行一次咬人攻击和两次爪子攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。如果目标是穿着任何类型的盔甲的生物，aurumvorax会重新获得4({@dice 1d6 + 1})点的命中。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})砍击伤害。如果目标是中型或小型生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 12})。在这个抓捕结束之前，aurumvorax不能对另一个目标使用它的爪子攻击，当它移动时，它可以拖动{@condition grappled}的生物，而aurumvorax的速度不会被减半。

trait.name: Pack Leader
entries: aurumvorax的盟友在aurumvorax的10英尺范围内有攻击卷的优势，只要不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: aurumvorax能以其一半的钻探速度钻过坚固的岩石和金属，并在其身后留下一条直径5英尺的隧道。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 奥鲁姆沃拉克斯进行一次咬人攻击和两次爪子攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。如果目标是穿着任何类型的盔甲的生物，aurumvorax会获得其选择的以下好处之一。

action.name: Frenzy
entries: aurumvorax在攻击卷上有优势，直到它的下一个回合开始。

action.name: Invigorate
entries: 奥鲁姆沃拉克斯恢复6({@dice 1d8 + 2})点生命值。

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})砍击伤害。如果目标是大型或小型生物，则是{@condition grappled}(逃跑{@dc 14})。在这个抓捕结束之前，aurumvorax不能对另一个目标使用它的爪子攻击，当它移动时，它可以拖动{@condition grappled}的生物，而aurumvorax的速度不会被减半。

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: 巴库纳瓦可以呼吸空气和水。

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: 如果巴库纳瓦的拯救动作失败，它可以选择成功。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 巴库纳瓦进行一次咬人攻击和一次风暴猛击攻击。

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5})穿刺伤害加上7 ({@damage 2d6})闪电伤害。如果目标是大型或较小的生物，它必须在一个{@dc 17}的力量投掷中成功，否则将被巴库纳瓦吞噬。被吞噬的生物是{@condition blinded}和{@condition restrained}，它有完全的掩护，可以抵御攻击和巴库纳瓦以外的其他效果。在巴库纳瓦的每个回合开始时，每个被吞食的生物会受到10（%8%）的雷电伤害。
巴库纳瓦的咽喉一次最多可以容纳两个生物。如果巴库纳瓦在一个回合内从被吞的生物身上受到30次以上的伤害，巴库纳瓦必须在该回合结束时成功地进行一次{@dc 16}宪法救赎，或者将所有被吞的生物反刍出来，这些生物会在巴库纳瓦15英尺内的空间里掉落{@condition prone}。如果巴库纳瓦死亡，被吞食的生物不再被它影响（%2%），并且可以通过使用15英尺的移动距离，从尸体上逃脱（%3%）。

action.name: Storm Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9}击中，达到10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5})重击伤害加上5 ({@damage 1d10})雷霆伤害，并且目标被推到水平方向上最多10英尺，远离巴库纳瓦。

legendary.name: Nimble Glide
entries: 巴库纳瓦的飞行或游泳的速度达到其一半。这种运动不会引起机会攻击。

legendary.name: Slam
entries: 巴库纳瓦进行了一次风暴猛击攻击。

legendary.name: Lightning Strikes (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: 巴库纳瓦向自己60英尺范围内能看到的最多两个生物发出闪电弧。每个目标必须在一个{@dc 15}灵巧的蓄力动作上成功，否则会受到22({@damage 4d10})的闪电伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 侦察员进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Broken Bottle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Diva Luma进行了两次高跟鞋攻击。

action.name: High-Heeled Shoe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

items.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1})穿刺伤害。

monster.name: Haint
languages: any languages it knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: 圣人可以在其他生物和物体中移动，就像它们是困难的地形一样。如果它在一个物体内结束它的回合，它会受到5（（%0%））的力量伤害。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 圣人不需要空气、食物、饮料或睡眠。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 污鬼进行两次悲伤的触摸攻击。

action.name: Sorrowful Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个生物。{@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3})精神伤害。

action.name: Change Shape
entries: 隐者会神奇地呈现出它生前的人形外观，同时保留它的游戏数据。如果圣人的生命值减少到0或者使用一个动作来结束它，那么这个假设的外观就会结束。

bonus.name: Shared Sorrow
entries: 隐者的目标是它能看到的60英尺范围内的一个缺少任何命中率的生物，与这个痛苦的灵魂分享自己的折磨。目标必须在一个{@dc 14}的智慧救赎中成功，否则会被{@condition incapacitated}。
一个生物可以在它的每个回合结束时重复蓄力，如果成功，则结束对它的影响。如果一个生物的救赎成功或效果结束，该生物在接下来的24小时内对圣徒的共同悲伤免疫。

monster.name: Nene
languages: Understands simple phrases and concepts in Common

items.name: Water Breathing
entries: 夜海儿童只能在水下呼吸。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 帕里人可以施展以下一种法术，不需要任何物质成分，并使用魅力作为施法能力（法术保存（%0%））。

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: 帕里人对法术和其他魔法效果的救赎有优势。

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: 帕里不需要吃、喝、睡。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 帕里人进行三次梅斯攻击。

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})重击伤害加上14 ({@damage 4d6})辐射伤害。

action.name: Disorienting Futures
entries: 帕里试图用未来的幻象淹没自己60英尺内的一个生物的头脑。目标必须在{@dc 19}智慧救赎中成功，否则会受到27({@damage 5d10})的精神伤害，并且在攻击卷中处于劣势，直到帕里人下一回合开始。

items.name: Royal Blood
entries: If Kirina is reduced to half of his hit points or fewer, he uses the {@action Dodge} action to avoid taking further damage.

items.name: Royal Blood
entries: If Simbon is reduced to half of his hit points or fewer, he uses the {@action Dodge} action to avoid taking further damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The riverine casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The riverine can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the riverine fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The riverine makes two Flood Strike attacks.

action.name: Flood Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

bonus.name: Whirlpool Step
entries: The riverine magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of itself. Both the space it leaves and its destination must be in or on the surface of water.

legendary.name: Whirlpool Rush
entries: The riverine uses its Whirlpool Step. Immediately after it teleports, each creature within 5 feet of the riverine's destination space takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) cold damage.

legendary.name: Raging Deluge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The riverine unleashes a torrent of river water in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Enthralled Lure (1/Day)
entries: The soul shaker can cast the {@spell geas} spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 12}).

trait.name: Reconstruction
entries: When the soul shaker is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes into 7 ({@dice 1d4 + 5}) crawling claws. After 6 ({@dice 1d12}) days, if at least two of those crawling claws are alive, they teleport to the location of the soul shaker's death and merge together, whereupon the soul shaker reforms and regains all its hit points.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The soul shaker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Crushing Grasp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). The soul shaker can have only one creature {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

bonus.name: Consume Vitality
entries: The soul shaker targets a creature it is grappling. If the target is not a Construct or an Undead, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the soul shaker regains hit points equal to that amount. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tlacatecolo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tlacatecolo makes two Talon attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The tlacatecolo magically transforms into a Medium owl, while retaining its game statistics (other than its size). This transformation ends if the tlacatecolo is reduced to 0 hit points or if it uses its action to end it.

action.name: Plague Winds (Fiend Form Only; Recharge 5-6)
entries: The tlacatecolo emits a chilling, disease-ridden wind in a 60-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 4d12}) cold damage and become {@condition poisoned}.

While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature can't regain hit points. At the end of every hour, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. If the creature is in direct sunlight when it makes this saving throw, it automatically succeeds on the save.
If the creature is targeted by magic that ends a poison or disease, such as lesser restoration, while the creature isn't in direct sunlight, the effect does not end.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the tlexolotl's turns, each creature within 10 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in that aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the tlexolotl or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The tlexolotl sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tlexolotl regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the tlexolotl takes cold damage or is immersed in water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the tlexolotl's next turn. The tlexolotl dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tlexolotl makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) piercing damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the tlexolotl and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Pyroclasm {@recharge 5}
entries: Gouts of molten lava erupt from the tlexolotl's body. Each creature in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on the tlexolotl must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage and 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful saving throw, a creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Blurred Form
entries: Attack rolls against the whistler are made with disadvantage unless the whistler is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The whistler doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The whistler makes three Psychic Swipe attacks.

action.name: Psychic Swipe
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Otherworldly Melody {@recharge 5}
entries: The whistler telepathically whistles an otherworldly melody into the minds of up to two creatures it can see within range of its telepathy. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage and become {@condition frightened} of the whistler for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat this saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

bonus.name: Surreal Step
entries: The whistler teleports up to 20 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cloak of the Mountain {@recharge 4}
entries: The wynling magically turns {@condition invisible}, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, for 1 minute or until it makes an attack roll.

reaction.name: Trickster's Flight
entries: Immediately after a creature the wynling can see misses the wynling with an attack roll, the wynling can move up to 30 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

items.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greathammer attacks.

items.name: Greathammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.
